subject: Broken control box
description_text:
Hello, I got your plus X pedals with VAM  motors, like a month ago and on Friday, I was playing as usual and suddenly I heard a pop and smell like something was burning and the pedals stoppped working. It feels like it shorted how, I don’t know why, this should be covered by warranty, right? 

I got my hands on older control box from old Plus pedals and its working just fine.

Order number of the pedals was : SSN2712.

Thanks for response in advance.

Matěj Pavlát

conversations.body_text: Hi Matěj Pavlát,  Please confirm that the PlusX control box is working properly and only one VAM motor is damaged, correct? If so, we can send you a replacement motor. Please provide your contact name, phone number, and shipping address.

Np. the whole control box is broken, nothing works when its connect to PC,
I have two VAM motors, brake and throttle pedal, when its connected to the
control box it doesnt work, my PC wont even recognize that its plugged in.
When I use the old control box with the SAME cable that I used the pedals
work, cant really test the VAM motors, since the old control box doesn´t
have a slot for them.

The problem is clearly in the control box, not in the motor, the power
supply should be fine since its still showing a green light.

út 11. 11. 2025 v 7:46 odesílatel service@simsonn.com

Hi Matěj Pavlát,     Please try the following steps to restore the system.   Launch the latest version of SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2.  On the “Plus X” control unit, press and hold the “Upgrade” button.  While holding the button, unplug the USB cable from the PC and then plug it back in. The software should detect the device entering “SIMSONN Flasher update mode”.  In the software go to: Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update.  In the file selector choose: pedals‑firmware → pedals‑plusx.sfu.  Click “Start Update” and wait until the firmware is completely written. During this process do not disconnect the USB or close the application.  Once the update is finished (you’ll get a success prompt or the unit will reboot), unplug and re‑plug the USB then test the pedal device to confirm everything works correctly.

Unfortunatelly this solution didn´t work, the app showed its not connected
the whole time

út 11. 11. 2025 v 9:55 odesílatel service@simsonn.com

Hi Matěj Pavlát,  Please press and hold the Upgrade button on the control box, then reconnect the USB cable. Does Simsonn Manager 2.1.2 still fail to display “SIMSONN Flasher Mode”? If it doesn’t enter the mode, I can help you check it remotely. Could you please install ToDesk?

Tried it again, didn’t show up + the box was obviously overheating and funky smell was coming from it.

What exactly do you need a remote control for? I am an IT technician so I can get you whatever you need, I work with things like this everyday

Odesláno z aplikace Outlook pro iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
Od: service@simsonn.com
Hi Matěj Pavlát,    Okay, we've already sent you a new control box.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047044215321

Thank you,

This was really fast, great customer service, thank you again!

Od: Matěj Pavlát <matej.pavlat16@gmail.com>
Odesláno: Wednesday, November 12, 2025 8:07:40 AM
Komu: service@simsonn.com

I recieved the control box today but everything got even worst than it was.

for starters, the brake works fine, but I am not getting any input on the
throttle pedal, I mean, it jumps in like ten numbers, but when I press it,
nothing happens. It sometimes works, but only when its plugged in the
clucth port and the cable has to be in a very specific position which is
not suistainable.

and as if this wasnt enough, something greasy came from the throttle pedal
hydraulic rod, which I think caused everything, because it dripped right
onto the throttle load cell sensor.

I also grounded the box to the throttle pedal, even to brake pedal, nothing
works.

Frankly, I am tired of this, I got your pedals for three months and they
were unusable for most of the time. Firstly the VAMs were taking forever to
arrive from china, then the control box stopped working and now this..This
ain´t even a decent product..

How can we resolve this? I want to use the pedals after almost three
months..

po 24. 11. 2025 v 9:12 odesílatel service@simsonn.com

For now, the pedals at least worked with the old control box, the brake still does, but the throttle stopped working on the control box aswell

Odesláno z aplikace Outlook pro iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
Od: Matěj Pavlát <matej.pavlat16@gmail.com>
Odesláno: Friday, November 28, 2025 7:11:45 PM
Komu: service@simsonn.com

Hi Matěj Pavlát,  If the throttle pedal needs to be plugged into the clutch port to work, first make sure all pedals are connected to the control unit. Then unplug and re-plug the USB, open SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2, click the Offset button to zero the pedal signal, and recalibrate the pedals. After this, the throttle should function properly.

Did not help, the Plus X throttle still doesn’t work .

To clarify the problem, I have your new Plus X pedals, the throttle doesn’t work; it does have some signal (video included here: https://youtube.com/shorts/n83ZjzpTkCc?si=FOdnf9SuUiGI-cXz )    , but its just jumping even though its grounded properly.

I also have lent your Plus pedals from my friend, and the throttle on them works perfectly fine, even in the throttle port.

My guess is that either I grounded it properly since you don’t have clear instructions on grounding it (photo of my rig included) or the oil from hydraulic rod which broke and leaked out damaged the sensor, which is obviously not my fault..

Thank you for response

Matej

Odesláno z aplikace Outlook pro iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>

Hi Matěj Pavlát,     I apologize for the delayed response. After verification, we have reshipped the accelerator pedal to you. However, you now mention that the clutch pedal is defective. Both the product cost and the logistics cost for each shipment are extremely high, and I hope you can understand this. I aim to resolve this issue as soon as possible, but we are currently experiencing some confusion. Will reshipping the clutch pedal fully resolve your problem, or are there still other issues present?
Hi Matěj Pavlát,    We apologize for misunderstanding your request. We mistakenly sent you the wrong pedal. We will promptly resend the throttle pedal to you.

Hi,

Thank you for your response.

All I need is the accelerator pedal, the clutch one is fine as I don’t really need it and there are no problems with it, I only wrote that it’s not ideal to use it as a throttle pedal. So as long as I get a proper accelerator pedal, I’m fine.

Thank you

Matěj Pavlát
